en.pressContinue: Press the next button to continue.
en.opening_0: Hello!! Welcome To Garden Family. Here, we will grow some Animals and Plants
en.opening_1: I can't do all this things by my self, so i need you to help me
en.opening_2: I will bring some animals and plants to the garden.
en.firstdeer_0: What you need to do just give them what they need.
en.firstdeer_1: All item what you need is on the box below
en.firstdeer_2: And the important thing is dont too long to feed them. They will run out of our garden.
en.firstdeer_3: Just drag it to the animals or plants, put trash to the trash bin if you find some.
en.firstdeer_4: Not only the trash, you can put unneeded item too the trash bin to get new item
en.firstgrow_1: Naturally if you give them enough food their body will become bigger.
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_0: At some point, animal body structure grow to different shape
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_1: For example on this animal, the body structure have different part from before.
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_2: Wow! I'm very curious about how it's change on next step
en.firstplant_0: I bought a new plant, it has different needs than animals.
en.firstplant_1: Its also could grow too. Let's find out how it grows.
en.firstplant_2: Wohoo.. I can't wait to see it!!
en.firstduck_0: Hey i bought some little cute ducks.
en.firstduck_1: Duck have different grow step. Before it can walk and run, duck come from an egg.
en.firstduck_2: And also it can grow too... Lets see how it's happen.
en.firstplantgrow_0: Do you want to know about plants??
en.firstplantgrow_1: Plants have different grow step from animals.
en.firstplantgrow_3: After it got enough mineral from soil and water, come a sprout.
en.firstplantgrow_4: And its become bigger after several times. Until it has perfect structure that consist of some part like root, stem, leaf, etc
en.deergrowfinalstructure_0: This is the final form of this animals. Looked so brave right!
en.deergrowfinalstructure_1: Beside it has different look from its grow. The bone inside its body change too.
en.deergrowfinalstructure_2: Like the example before, the bone grow longer than before.
en.deergrowfinalstructure_3: Lets continue findout more shape of our animals and plants.
en.finalgame_0: Cool!!! This is very fun. Everything is easier and more fun when we did it together.
en.finalgame_1: But now we meet the final part of the game.
en.finalgame_2: I hope besides you get fun thing after do all this thing with me. You got more information too.
